titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MANIFEST PSYCHOSIS DATE - Description

div.p: MANIFEST PSYCHOSIS DATE is the same as attribute PERSON PROPERTY OBSERVED DATE.

MANIFEST PSYCHOSIS DATE is the date at which a positive psychotic symptom for the PATIENT (i.e. delusion, hallucination, or thought disorder) has lasted for a week. This is usually a week after the date of the first psychotic symptom.
